title: I have spend 150 world tokens redeemed a pumpkin cat ward and it not appear in my account
body: I just spend 150 world tokens to redeemed a pumpkin cat ward but it not appear in my account. Does anyone know what happened with the redeem system?

replies.body: They're aware that there's a issue with purchases at the moment, give them some time to work it out maybe {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
